verses.content: Uzzia nau Jotham naupa Ahaz inlal lai chun, Suria lal Rezin le Israel lal Remalia naupa Peka chu Jerusalem rûn dingin an hang feh a; nisienlakhawm, an hne thei nawh a.

Chun, David sûnghai chu, “Suria chu Ephraim leh an ṭhang hmunkhat tah,” tiin an hril a. Chuongchun, a lungril le a khuoletuihai lungril chu, ramhnuoi thinghai thliin a sukhnîng suou suou ang hin, sukhnîngin a hung um tah a.
Chuongchun, LALPA chun Isai kuomah, “Nang le i naupa Sear-jasub chu, dîl sakhnung lem tuilâkna tâwpah, puon sâwptu phûl lamliena chun, Ahaz chu tuok dingin fe suok unla;
a kuomah, ‘Fimkhur la, um ṭawk ṭawk rawh, meiser bawng khu mei mei pahni, Suria le Rezin le Remalia naupa lunginsenna nasatak chu, ṭi naw la, i lungril chu inlau naw raw se.
Suria le Ephraim le Remalia naupa chun an phierrûk che a,
Juda chu hang thawin hang suk- buoi inla, chutaka chun ei ta dinga lûtna ding siemin, a lai takah Tabeel naupa chu lalah inṭhungtir ei tiu, tiin.
Chuleichun, Lalpa PATHIEN chun hieng ang hin a tih a: An thu phier chu puitling naw nih a, tluong- tlung bawk naw nih.
Suria lu chu Damaska a na, Damaska lu chu Rezin ringawt hi a ni el sih a; kum sâwmruk le kum nga bo hmain Ephraim chu chi ti tlâk loa um dingin suksiet vawngin um a tih;
chun, Ephraim lu chu Samari a na, Samari lu chu Remalia naupa ringawt el hi a ni sih a. In ring det naw chun sukdetin um ṭhuoi naw ti niu, tiin,’ ti rawh,” a ta.
Chun, LALPA chun Ahaz chu a biek nâwk a,
“LALPA i Pathien kuomah in- chikna hni rawh; inthûka manih, chungtieng insângtaka manih hni rawh,” a ta.
Ahaz ruok chun, “Hni naw ning ah, LALPA khawm infie bawk naw ning ah,” a ta.
Chun, ama chun, “Aw David sûnghai, tuhin lo ngai ta u, mihriem suksâwl hi thil chiretekah in ruot a ni maw? Ka Pathien chen khawm suk- sâwl in nuom rawp hi.
Chuleiin, LALPA ngei chun inchikna pêng a ti cheu a, ngai ta u, nunghâk inthieng pakhat inrai a ta, naupasal nei a ta, a hmingah Im- manuel sak a tih.
Ama chun thil ṭha naw tieng dit naw dân a hriet a, thil ṭha tieng dit nachâng a hriet pha chun nênetui kîng le khuoizu fa hlak a tih.
Naupang chu thil ṭha naw tieng dit naw nachâng le thil ṭha tieng dit nachâng a hriet hma khawmin lal pahni i theidahai ram chu rausanin um a tih.
Ephraim chun Juda a ṭhe nia inthawka la tlung ngailo nihai chu LALPA chun i chunga le, i khuoletui- hai chunga le, i pa sûnghai chunga chun intlungtir a tih; Assuria lal ngei chu,” a ta.
Chu nia chun LALPA chu Aigupta vadung tâwp rêta tho um le, Assuria rama khuoi um chu ko dingin faifûk a tih.
Chuongchun, hung an ta, an rêngin vadung ruom se rek rukahai, lungpui pûka dâm, hlohlingnei po poa dâm, ran tlatna hmun po poahai fûng an tih.
Chu nia chun LALPAIN rêpvâw haw, Vadungpui khêl rama, Assuria lal um chu hmangin, lu le ke hmul chu mêt fai a ta, khâk hmul khawm mêt fai vawng a tih.
Chuongchun, chu nia chun mi pakhatin bâwngla pakhat le berâm pahni chau vâi a tih;
nisienlakhawm, nênetui tam- tak an la pêk ding a ni leiin nênetui kîng fa hlak a tih; ram sûnga la umhai po chun nênetui kîng le khuoizu an la fâk seng ding a ni sih a.
Chun, chu nia chun hmun tin, grêp hrui sâng, tangka sâng man umna taphawt chu, buor le hlohling- nei hmun el hung ni tâng a tih.
Ram po po chu buor le hlohling- nei hmun ruok a hung ni tâk leiin chutaka chun thal le thalngul chawi- in fêng an tih.
Chun, tlâng bâwngtuthlawa cho ta po poa chun, buor le hlohlingnei ṭi leiin hung naw ti nih a, bâwngchalhai intlâttirna le berâm ichîl el ding ni ta lem a tih.
